text: C. N. Balakrishnan (18 November 1934 - 10 December 2018) was an Indian politician. He was the minister for Co-operation, Khadi and Village Industries and Pollution Control -Government of Kerala under the Oommen Chandy Ministry. He became the representative in the Wadakkanchery constituency in Kerala after winning in the 2011 State Election. Balakrishnan died on 10 December 2018 in Kochi, Kerala from kidney and heart failure at the age of 84.മുന്‍ മന്ത്രി സി.എന്‍ ബാലകൃഷ്ണന്‍ അന്തരിച്ചു ==References== ==Other websites== * Minister for Co-operation Khadi and Village Industries and Pollution Control at the Government of Kerala Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Kerala
title: C. N. Balakrishnan
